author: Ben Kew, Ben Kew
title: Brazil's Bolsonaro: 'We're All Going to Die,' Take Coronavirus 'like a Man'
description: Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro once again played down the threat posed by the Chinese coronavirus on Sunday, urging people to take it "like a man" and return to normality as quickly as possible.
content:
Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro once again played down the threat posed by the Chinese coronavirus on Sunday, urging people to take it “like a man” and return to normality as quickly as possible.
Bolsonaro is perhaps the only major world leader to be seem… [+2994 chars]
